content.hang: WOK is a really light and easy-to-use framework which means that everything you could need is still here. Not convinced ? This framework contains :

tools.compatibility: Some PHP compatibily functions (works even with PHP 5.1 or newer)
tools.mvc: An open MVC structure : The most easy way to create modules
tools.multilingual: A multilingual system : set translation, Locales do the rest
tools.libraries: Some external libraries such as frameworks and social SDKs
tools.open: And open structure which allow to custom everything

content.doubt: Still in doubt ? Click on the next button.
